title: Seal of Recognition
cleaned_text: Seal of Recognition The National Psoriasis Foundation Seal of Recognition highlights and recognizes over-the-counter products that have been created or intended to be non-irritating and safe for those living with psoriatic disease, as well as for those with severe sensitive skin or joint mobility limitations. The Seal of Recognition also recognizes products that are safe as a part of a daily skin care routine for sensitive skin to severely sensitive skin.
